data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Plumaroides Brothers (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea, Plumariidae) from Santiago del Estero, Argentina: male and female description

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Diez, Patricia A. (2008): A new species of the genus Plumaroides Brothers (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea, Plumariidae) from Santiago del Estero, Argentina: male and female description. Zootaxa 1891: 25-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184329
